name: show_daily_sales
description: Show sales broken down by day for a date range. Use for queries like "sales from X to Y", "day to day sales", "daily breakdown"

category.description: Optional category filter like "(Beer)" for primary category or "Bottle Beer" for subcategory

name: show_top_items
description: Show top N best-selling items. Use for queries like "top 10 items", "best sellers", "highest sales items"

limit.description: Number of top items to show (e.g., 5, 10, 20)

category.description: Optional category filter to show top items within that category

name: show_category_breakdown
description: Show sales broken down by category. Use for queries like "sales by category", "category breakdown", "which categories sold most"

includeBeer.description: Whether to include beer categories (default true)

name: get_total_sales
description: Get total sales for a period. Use for queries like "total sales", "how much did we make", "revenue for"

category.description: Optional category filter to get total for specific category

name: find_peak_day
description: Find the day with highest or lowest sales in a period. Use for queries like "best day", "worst day", "highest sales day", "slowest day"

type.description: Whether to find highest or lowest day

name: compare_day_types
description: Compare sales between different day types (weekday vs weekend, or specific days). Use for queries like "weekends vs weekdays", "Fridays vs Saturdays"

name: track_item_performance
description: Track performance of a specific item over time. Use for queries like "how is [item] selling", "track [item] sales", "[item] performance"

itemName.description: Name of the item to track

name: compare_periods
description: Compare sales between two separate time periods (months, weeks, or custom date ranges). Use for queries like "compare May and June", "May vs June", "this month vs last month", "Q1 vs Q2", "week 1 vs week 2"

startDate1.description: Start date of first period in YYYY-MM-DD format

endDate1.description: End date of first period in YYYY-MM-DD format

startDate2.description: Start date of second period in YYYY-MM-DD format

endDate2.description: End date of second period in YYYY-MM-DD format

category.description: Optional category filter like "(Sushi)" for primary category or "Signature Rolls" for subcategory
